definition: that's all/nothing more
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
already/to stop/then/afterwards
nothing serious/just hot air
that's all/just this and nothing more

sentences.english: He is only teasing. Don't take it so seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是戲弄而已，別太當回事兒。

sentences.english: Walking home by the alma mater is just for seeking fun.
sentences.chinese: 經過母校步行回家僅僅爲了取樂而已。

sentences.english: The little chicks had no more than whetted his appetite.
sentences.chinese: 那幾只小雞隻不過引起了他的食慾而已。

sentences.english: "This case is no different than any other case, " Lott said yesterday.
sentences.chinese: “這只是一件普通的案子而已，”洛特昨天表示。
他僅僅是涉足政治而已。

sentences.english: All part of a big conspiracy on the part of the cobblers .
sentences.chinese: 這全是那些修鞋匠陰謀的一部分而已。

sentences.english: B: I'm just trying to do a good job and get everything finished on time.
sentences.chinese: 我只是努力把工作做好，讓所有的事情如期完成而已。

sentences.english: "Creative Dream Present Arts" & "Artlim Media · Creative Dream". And when the love goes on……
sentences.chinese: 沒有相應的製作軟件的話，那幾本是個夢想而已了吧。
我才離你一個隔間而已。

sentences.english: It has simply lost its physical body, gone virtual.
sentences.chinese: 它僅僅只是失去了紙幣的皮囊，變成虛擬貨幣而已。

sentences.english: We are simply redressing the balance.
sentences.chinese: 我們只是讓它恢復平衡而已。

sentences.english: He is only a political buffoon, I have indentified it.
sentences.chinese: 他只是一個政治小丑而已，鑑定完畢。

sentences.english: That's it. No file is being imported.
sentences.chinese: 僅此而已，沒有任何文件被導入。

sentences.english: The aggressive elephants are simply defending their territories, apparently.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，這些大象只是在保衛自己的領土而已。

sentences.english: Never make a move if you are merely optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只是樂觀而已，千萬不要輕舉妄動。

definition: a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
merely/simply/only/but
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
barely/only/merely/only (this and nothing more)
actually/in fact/really
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
at most/at best
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
only/nothing else
perhaps/maybe
perhaps/maybe
that's all/just this and nothing more
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
